# Security

## Reporting a vulnerability

Please **do not** open a public issue for security vulnerabilities.

To report a vulnerability, open a [GitHub Security Advisory](https://docs.github.com/en/code-security/security-advisories/working-with-repository-security-advisories/creating-a-repository-security-advisory) from this repo’s **Security** tab, or contact the maintainers privately.

We’ll acknowledge receipt and work with you on next steps.

## Supported versions

We release security updates for the latest major version. Please keep dependencies up to date (e.g. with Dependabot).
